mapper.select: SELECT s.id FROM tb_school s ,tb_college c,tb_grade g WHERE g.`college.id` = c.id AND c.`school.id` = s.id AND g.id=#{gradeId}
SELECT name FROM tb_grade WHERE id=#{gradeId}

SELECT (CASE WHEN g.stu_import=FALSE AND c.user_import=TRUE THEN 1 WHEN g.stu_import=TRUE AND c.user_import= TRUE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END) FROM tb_college c,tb_grade g WHERE g.`college.id`=c.id AND g.id=#{gradeId}

SELECT (CASE WHEN (g.lesson_term IS NULL OR g.lesson_term!=#{currentTerm}) AND c.lesson_import=TRUE THEN 1 WHEN g.lesson_term IS NOT NULL AND g.lesson_term=#{currentTerm} AND c.lesson_import=TRUE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END) FROM tb_college c,tb_grade g WHERE g.`college.id`=c.id AND g.id=#{gradeId}
